mapper.select: SELECT fat_judg_cd /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,fn_getCdNm('FAT_JUDG_CD', fat_judg_cd) as fat_judg_nm ,bmi_fr ,bmi_to ,fidx_fr /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */ ,fidx_to /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */ ,curr_eval_cntn /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(100) */ ,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */ ,trim(reg_dt) /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ AS reg_dt ,trim(reg_tm) /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ AS reg_tm ,trim(reg_user_id) /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ AS reg_user_id ,trim(upt_dt) /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ AS upt_dt ,trim(upt_tm) /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ AS upt_tm ,trim(upt_user_id) /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ AS upt_user_id FROM ti_fat_judg_stnd WHERE fat_judg_cd LIKE CONCAT (#{fatJudgCd}, '%') /* ment_strs_stat_cd 정신적_스트레스_상태_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.insert:
/* insertTiFatJudgStnd */ INSERT INTO ti_fat_judg_stnd ( fat_judg_cd /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,bmi_fr ,bmi_to ,fidx_fr /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */ ,fidx_to /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */
,curr_eval_cntn /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(100) */
,prdt_eval_cntn /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,reg_dt /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,reg_tm /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,reg_user_id /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,upt_dt /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ) VALUES ( #{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */ ,CAST(#{bmiFr} as integer) /* bmi_fr numeric */ ,CAST(#{bmiTo} as integer) /* bmi_to numeric */ ,CAST(#{fidxFr} as integer) /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */ ,CAST(#{fidxTo} as integer) /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */
,#{currEvalCntn} /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(100) */
,#{prdtEvalCntn} /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* reg_dt 등록_일자 character(8) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') /* reg_tm 등록_시각 character(6) */ ,#{regUserId} /* reg_user_id 등록_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'YYYYMMDD') /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,TO_CHAR(NOW(), 'HH24MISS') /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,#{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */ )
mapper.update:
/* updateTiFatJudgStnd */ UPDATE ti_fat_judg_stnd
,bmi_fr = CAST(#{bmiFr} as integer) /* bmi_fr BMI_FROM numeric */
,bmi_to = CAST(#{bmiTo} as integer) /* bmi_to BMI_TO numeric */
,fidx_fr = CAST(#{fidxFr} as integer) /* fidx_fr 비만지수_FROM numeric */
,fidx_to = CAST(#{fidxTo} as integer) /* fidx_to 비만지수_TO numeric */
,curr_eval_cntn = #{currEvalCntn} /* curr_eval_cntn 현재_평가_내용 character varying(100) */
,prdt_eval_cntn = #{prdtEvalCntn} /* prdt_eval_cntn 예측_평가_내용 character varying(4000) */
,upt_dt = #{uptDt} /* upt_dt 수정_일자 character(8) */ ,upt_tm = #{uptTm} /* upt_tm 수정_시각 character(6) */ ,upt_user_id = #{uptUserId} /* upt_user_id 수정_사용자_ID character varying(20) */
WHERE 1 = 1 AND fat_judg_cd = #{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
mapper.delete: /* deleteTiFatJudgStnd */ DELETE FROM ti_fat_judg_stnd WHERE 1 = 1 AND fat_judg_cd = #{fatJudgCd} /* fat_judg_cd 비만_판정_코드 character varying(20) */
